title: From chains to a crown - The Emperor Jones (1933) Paul Robeson, Billie Holiday | Pre-Code Musical

sources.title: From chains to a crown - The Emperor Jones (1933) Paul Robeson, Billie Holiday | Pre-Code Musical
sources.description:
Unscrupulously ambitious Brutus Jones escapes from jail after killing a guard and through bluff and bravado finds himself the emperor of a Caribbean island.

Original title: The Emperor Jones (1933) 

Directors: Dudley Murphy, William C. de Mille 
Writers: Eugene O'Neill, DuBose Heyward 

Main cast:
Paul Robeson – Brutus Jones
Dudley Digges – Smithers
Frank H. Wilson – Jeff
Fredi Washington – Undine
Ruby Elzy – Dolly
Billie Holiday - Cameo nightclub scene

Genres: Drama, Music, Pre Code
Release date: September 29, 1933
Filming location: Jones Beach, Long Island, New York


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/UJAXpgYfcKU


@CultCinemaClassics

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZSGbwx2_VOBTa26CIfvemh
